xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Translations
xwikidoc.content: ## Homepage Tour (by steps order) tour.homepageTour.welcome.title=Welcome to XWiki tour.homepageTour.welcome.content=In the next couple of minutes you will discover your wiki's interface and basic functionalities. tour.homepageTour.panels.title=Panels tour.homepageTour.panels.contentA=The current panels allow you to access your wiki's applications and pages. tour.homepageTour.panels.contentB=Administrators can customize them and decide which panels are shown. tour.homepageTour.breadcrumbs.title=Breadcrumbs tour.homepageTour.breadcrumbs.contentA=The breadcrumbs allow you to identify where your page is located and navigate the hierarchy. tour.homepageTour.breadcrumbs.contentB=The {0} button will always take you to the wiki's home page. tour.homepageTour.pageContent.title=Page Content tour.homepageTour.pageContent.contentA=This is the place where the content of the current page is displayed. tour.homepageTour.pageContent.contentB=Edit this page to add tables, lists, macros and structure in order to organize your knowledge. tour.homepageTour.pageMenu.title=Page Menu tour.homepageTour.pageMenu.contentA=This menu contains page related actions. With the appropriate rights, you can edit, create, administer or delete pages. tour.homepageTour.pageMenu.contentB=The {0} button reveals more actions like Export, Print and Share. tour.homepageTour.pageTabs.title=Page Tabs tour.homepageTour.pageTabs.contentA=Comments are a great way for users to discuss the page content. tour.homepageTour.pageTabs.contentB=You can also attach files, compare page versions or see page information. tour.homepageTour.header.title=Header tour.homepageTour.header.contentA=You can Search for content, Watch for page changes or access your User Profile. tour.homepageTour.header.contentB=The {0} button opens a Drawer which contains wiki related actions like Administration and Indexes. tour.homepageTour.tourComplete.title=Tour Complete tour.homepageTour.tourComplete.contentA=This completes your tour on XWiki's interface and basic functionalities. tour.homepageTour.tourComplete.contentB=For more details on each feature, access the {0}documentation{1}.
